arStrings.szText: You gain {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds after {c_important}Teleporting{/c}.
{c_important}Teleport{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage. It also forms a {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} for each enemy it hits, up to {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} .
After {c_important}Teleporting{/c}, you gain {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
